column1: Little Goat Diner////I am a business owner
column2: and i would hate to write such poor review such as this.. but
column3: enough is enough already!! i read reviews (VERY GOOD REVIEWS) on yelp before trying out Little Goat Diner only to be extremely disappointed. Are the reviews on Yelp FAKE?? or has Chicagoans completely lost their taste in good food??
